Title: vLLM introduced enhanced protection for CVE-2025-62164
Description: The fix [here](https://github.com/vllm-project/vllm/pull/27204) for CVE-2025-62164 is not sufficient. The fix only disables prompt embeds by default rather than addressing the root cause, so the DoS vulnerability remains when the feature is enabled.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.10.2, all versions starting from 0.13.0
